restarter.partial_hang_warn: Due to a partial hang, this server will restart in 1 minute. Please disconnect now.
restarter.partial_hang_warn_discord: Due to a partial hang, **%{servername}** will restart in 1 minute.
restarter.schedule_warn: Acest server este programat sa se restarteze in %{smart_count} minut. Va rugam sa va deconctati. |||| Acest server este programat sa se restarteze in %{smart_count} minute.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** este programat sa se restarteze in %{smart_count} minut. |||| **%{servername}** este programat sa se restarteze in %{smart_count} minute.

ban_messages.kick_temporary: (%{author}) You have been banned from this server for "%{reason}". Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
ban_messages.kick_permanent: (%{author}) You have been permanently banned from this server for "%{reason}".
ban_messages.reject_temporary:
You have been banned from this server.
Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.
ban_messages.reject_permanent:
You have been permanently banned from this server.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.

nui_warning.title: AVERTIZARE
nui_warning.instruction: Țineți [SPACE] timp de 10 secunde pentru a respinge acest mesaj.
